ChangeDescriptions.ChangeDescription: Version 2.37: Updated the Sink object to use the string '[DynamicObjects]' as the Data Source field for classifying the sink's 'Time In System' tally statistic results.
Version 2.39: Updated the Sink object process logic to specify all of the object's process delays as non-interruptible. Added a 'State Assignments' property category.
Version 2.40: In the object process logic, the 'Action' property for all Execute steps executing an 'add-on process' is now specified as 'WaitUntilCompleted'.
Version 2.41: Specified the Unit Type property of the Sink object's 'TimeInSystem' TallyStatistic as 'Time'. Updated the assignments repeat groups to take state units into account.

Version 3.42: Changes related to setting the 'Token Associated Object Destroyed Action' option for process logic in this object. Changed the Category field for classifying the sink's 'Time In System' tally statistic results.
Version 3.47: Add new 'Appearance' property category.
Version 3.49: Specified the 'OnAssociatedObjectTransferRequested' property of some processes as 'EndProcess'.
Version 3.54: Conversion to 'OnRunInitialized' standard interface process. Added 'Run Ending' add-on process trigger.
Version 4.58: 'Data Source' results classification for 'TimeInSystem' tally statistic is now 'DestroyedObjects'. Added new 'Advanced Options' property category.
Version 4.61: Added new 'Financials' property category.
Version 4.62: Added new 'Financials->Buffer Costs' property category.
Version 4.63: Reordered the position of the 'Financials' property category.
Version 4.68: Renamed 'InitializedAddOnProcess' property to 'RunInitializedAddOnProcess'.
Version 5.91: Added information to indicate which properties to display if the new 'Show Commonly Used Properties Only' option is enabled.
Version 6.98: Added new 'Log Time In System Observations' property (Advanced Options).
Version 6.103: Some property description updates.
Version 7.130: Required update due to BasicNode object updates.
Version 7.131: Required update due to BasicNode object updates.
Version 8.133: Required update due to BasicNode object updates.
Version 8.134: Required update due to BasicNode object updates.
Version 8.135: Hide the inherited 'ExpectedSetupTimeExpression' and 'ExpectedOperationTimeExpression' properties.
Version 8.137: Required update due to BasicNode object updates.
Version 8.147: Property description string updates.
Version 12.212: Required update due to BasicNode and TransferNode object updates.
Version 14.225: Updated External View graphics to rotate with object.
Version 15.256: Required update due to BasicNode and TransferNode object updates.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TransferInTime
ExpressionProperty.Description: The time required to transfer an entity into this object.

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEntering
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is entering the object.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

ElementProperty.Name: RunInitializedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is initialized.

ElementProperty.Name: RunEndingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is ending.

ElementProperty.Name: EnteredAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs immediately after an entity has entered this object and is about to start the 'Transfer-In Time'.

ElementProperty.Name: DestroyingEntityAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity is about to be destroyed by this Sink object.

ExpressionProperty.Name: CapitalCost
ExpressionProperty.Description: The initial one-time setup cost to add this object to the system.

ExpressionProperty.Name: InputBufferCostPerUse
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost to hold an entity in this buffer irrespective of the waiting time.

ExpressionProperty.Name: InputBufferHoldingCostRate
ExpressionProperty.Description: The cost per unit time to hold an entity in this buffer.

BooleanProperty.Name: LogTimeInSystemObservations
BooleanProperty.Description: Indicates whether the time in system observations on entities destroyed by this Sink object are to be automatically logged. Go to Results -> Logs -> Tally Observation Log to view the logged data.

Element.Name: TimeInSystem
Element.Description: The tally statistic that records time in system observations on entities destroyed by this Sink object.

Element.Name: InputBuffer
Element.Description: The location inside the sink that entities enter to be destroyed.
